roleset.name: create a profile

example.name: profile-v: oddly intransitive
example.text: Energy Transportation retained Litigation Sciences , at a cost of several hundred thousand dollars , to poll , pre - try , profile and shadow .

example.name: profile-v: passive
example.text: Her husband and older son -- a computer prodigy profiled in The Wall Street Journal in 1981 , when he was 13 -- run a software company with expected sales this year of $ 10 million .

example.name: profiling-n
example.text: DNA profiling was developed in 1984 by British geneticist Sir Alec Jeffreys , and first used in forensic science to convict Colin Pitchfork in the 1988 Enderby murders case .

roleset.note: PROFILE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'profile' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from profile.01-v predicate notes)
